intro: Palafoxia arida, commonly known as desert palafoxia, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. The plant is characterized by its upright, branching structure and small, yellow to reddish-pink flowers that bloom in late summer. Palafoxia arida is often found in disturbed soils and is considered a hardy, drought-tolerant species.
